text: Anata gata shinko suru mono yo, shukai no ori ni (hiroku) seki o ake nasai to iwa reta toki wa, sugu seki o yuzure. Arra wa anata gata no tame ni (jubun'na) seki o atae rareru. Mata tachinoboru yo iwa reta toki wa, sugu tate. Arra wa anata gata no naka shinko suru mono ya, chishiki o sadzuke rareta mono no ikai o age rareru. Hontoni arra wa, anata gata no okonau issai o jukuchi nasa reru
